episodes.title: Mahiru to Kuro
episodes.plot: The story revolves around a 16-year-old boy named Mahiru Shirota who likes simple things and dislikes difficult things. One day, he picks up a stray black cat he finds in the middle of the road and names it Kuro. From this moment on, a contract between the Servamp Sleepy Ash - "Kuro" and Mahiru are formed. Mahiru is pulled into a servamp war between the Servamps, representing the seven deadly sins, and their eighth sibling Tsubaki.

episodes.title: Tsubaki
episodes.plot: Mahiru's pet Kuro turns out to be a servant vampire, or servamp. Mahiru rushes back to school to find out what happened, but his friends do not remember. All Mahiru knows is that a person named Tsubaki is after Kuro...

episodes.title: About the Future That Never Came
episodes.plot: Mahiru finds out that his best friend, Sakuya, is actually one of Tsubaki's subclass. Why did he get close to Mahiru in the first place? Is Sakuya truly Mahiru's friend or is that another one of the lies that Sakuya hates so much?

episodes.title: Sakuya
episodes.plot: Mahiru nearly gets consumed by the power that he had asked for, but a stranger with the servamp of Envy comes to save them in the nick of time. Mahiru realizes that just having power doesn't solve anything and struggles to figure out what to do next.

episodes.title: I Am an Adult. This Is Society.
episodes.plot: Mahiru continues to meet new people one after another. Next, he meets a strange boy carrying a coffin at the summer festival as he tries to turn in a lost suitcase given to him by a stranger. People start to take action, each with their own reasons.

episodes.title: Tenshi ka Akuma
episodes.plot: Mahiru meets with another suspicious character, a visiting pianist from Austria. He comes to find that the pianist, Licht, is actually the Eve of Greed, Lawless. However, Lawless isn't as friendly as the other siblings Mahiru has met so far.

episodes.title: Nazenara ore wa
episodes.plot: Servamp is action filled and there is quite a bit of fighting. The show is originally rated tv MA. The show is about a teenager whose name is Marihu Shirts. He likes everything simple anything difficult is too hard for him. He is kind of lazy as well. One day he finds a stray black cat in the middle of the road and named it Kuro. From that moment on, he made a contract with Kuro (a servamp sleepy ash) Marihu is pulled into a servamp war between the seven deadly servamp a and their eighth sibling,Tsubaki. There is one character that is seen smoking. Another seen ...

episodes.title: Nothing Begins Without Action...
episodes.plot: Kuro has been trapped away in a ball and the others will have to try and rescue Licht and Lawless before midnight without them. As they plan, Mahiru and Kuro head to the shop of a certain antique dealer, to find a way to get Kuro free.

episodes.title: I'm Not Wrong
episodes.plot: Misono and Tetsu go to save Lawless and Licht while Mahiru wanders within Kuro's mind to find a way to save him. Misono realizes how little they know of Tsubaki's intentions and Mahiru realizes just how much resolve it takes to face Kuro head-on.

episodes.title: Lawless
episodes.plot: Licht breaks through the wall to give Lawless a piece of his mind, face-to-face. Licht gets swallowed up by the darkness and the curtain rises on Lawless' past. What is it be unique? How can one become the one and only?

episodes.title: For Not Forgiving Me
episodes.plot: Licht and Lawless fight against Higan while Hugh lets his guard down due to the prideful idea that subclass could never be a match against him. Misono panics. Mahiru and Kuro arrive on the scene to help, but perhaps a bit too late.

episodes.title: Thinking Simply...
episodes.plot: The final battle is here and Mahiru struggles to get to Kuro as he steps forward and tries to face it all. Kuro faces his past, his neglected little brother Tsubaki, and his own actions which may have led to who Tsubaki is now.
